vision.title: Our Vision
vision.text: We strive to connect the world through personalized language learning. Above all, we value multicultural communication, friendship, and long-lasting relationships between students and teachers. We work to develop the best digital resources available and are committed to adjusting our lessons to fit students' goals. We also take feedback seriously and frequently update the website with requested features.

tailoredLessons.title: Tailored Lessons
tailoredLessons.text: Manabu teachers create personalized Japanese lesson plans that fit your learning styles and interests. Excercises and other materials are customized specifically for you.

immersion.title: Immersion
immersion.text: We focus on getting students into a habit of constant learning. We are confident that we can help you immerse and achieve your Japanese fluency goals.

dataAnalytics.title: Data Analytics
dataAnalytics.text: Through Manabu, you can visualize your progress and growth. This can not only a way to stay motivated, but can also help you find areas of improvement.

community.title: Community
community.text: Learning Japanese can be difficult, so if you ever feel stuck we are happy to guide you! We have a supportive community of teachers and staff that will aid you throughout your studies.

homepage.beta: As a special thanks to beta testers, if you sign up now and purchase a lesson plan you will receive permanent free access to ALL premium features we release in the future. Happy learning!

1.review: Started Manabu when they first established and I‚Äôve been with them ever since! Lessons are always enjoyable and have helped me leaps and bounds ‚ù§Ô∏è My listening and speaking skills have definitely improved since I first started and it‚Äôs all thanks to the lovely Rina Sensei! Misa-san is also always so willing to extend a helpful hand whenever I need anything. Thank you for always being so kind ü•∫ and I hope for this relationship to continue for a long time! „ÅÑ„Å§„ÇÇ„ÅÇ„Çä„Åå„Å®„ÅÜÔºÅ

2.review: Manabu has helped me immensely improve my Japanese as an intermediate learner. In fact, frequent lessons boosted my self-confidence so much that I can now comfortably immerse myself in the language and culture without being afraid of making mistakes. I love how friendly my teachers are, especially Hiromi and Rui sensei. They taught me how to express myself in different ways, where I was able to learn how to explain my work, hobbies/interests, and dreams in Japanese. I highly recommend Manabu and cannot wait to see more of their resources and technology in the future!

3.review: Thank you very much for accommodating me as your student. I can say that it was really a different experience to be able to speak with and learn from native Japanese teachers. I just felt very relaxed and confident in every lesson. Each time I got questions, Misa sensei and Rina sensei, helped me and clarified everything right away. The teachers are very friendly and accommodating. It was worth it and such a great chance for me to improve my Japanese skill. Once again, thank you very much for accommodating me. I have high hopes and best wishes for your school. I hope you can reach out to more students because you have a unique and effective support for Japanese learners like me.

4.review: Really great Japanese lessons and friendly teachers! I‚Äôve taken group Japanese classes at my university in Singapore as well as in Tokyo itself, but my one-to-one classes with Manabu are my favourite thus far ü•≥ I really appreciate the individualised and tailored lesson plans that they make to suit each student‚Äôs needs, as well as the affordable daily lessons that keep my brain working. I find it easier to memorise words and vocab when I‚Äôm constantly exposed to Japanese, rather than taking 2 1.5 hour classes twice a week (as I did in University) and getting burnt out + confused really fast. I‚Äôm very fortunate to have found Manabu Lessons online and look forward to continuing to improve my Japanese ‚ú®‚ú®

userAuth.name: You must input a name.
userAuth.email: You must input a valid email address.

password.length: Your must input a password that is at least 8 characters.

login.emailExists: An account with that email already exists.

error.currencyInput: You must input an integer that is greater than or equal to 5.

calendar.pastAppointment: You cannot reserve an appointment in the past.
calendar.unevenAvailableTime: Your appointments must be in 30 minute to 1 hour intervals.
calendar.badStartAvailableTime: You cannot start your appointments at that time (must be at the start of the hour or 30 minutes in).

onboarding.teacherLicenseUpload: You must upload an image or pdf or your teaching license.
onboarding.teacherIntroductionVideoUpload: You must upload an introduction video.
onboarding.teacherPriceData: You must input an hourly rate.

package.name: You must input a package name.
package.lessonAmount: You must input a lesson amount.
package.lessonDurations: Each package needs at least 1 duration.
package.isOffering: You must offer at least 1 package.

onboarding.name: @error.userAuth.name
onboarding.paymentData: You must input a PayPal email.

error.general: Oops, something went wrong. Please try again. If the problem continues, please contact support@manabu.com or reach out on social media.

questions.title: Questions?
questions.text: Find us on any of these platforms! We usually respond in 1-2 business days.

package.title: Please set up your lesson packages.

mainichi.title: Mainichi Plan
mainichi.description: This is for students who want to improve quickly and immerse themselves in speaking Japanese. With this plan, you will receive 20 personalized lessons, which is about 5 lessons every week.

moderate.title: Moderate Plan
moderate.description: This is for students who want a balanced but intensive learning schedule. With this plan, you will receive 12 personalized lessons, which is about 3 lessons every week.

light.title: Light Plan
light.description: This is for students who want to casually practice Japanese. With this plan, you will receive 5 personalized lessons, which is about 1 lesson every week.

custom.description: With this plan, you will receive {lessonAmount} personalized lessons, which is about {weeklyLessonAmount} lessons every week.

teacher.lessonAmount: {count} lesson left to reserve | {count} lessons left to reserve

dashboard.findTeacher: Need help finding the right teacher? Contact us at {0} and we'll find one for you! You can also click the button below to look through our teacher list. Happy learning!
